headline.main: FRIENDLESS CHILDREN.; The Industrial or Reformatory Schools.

docs.lead_paragraph: There are many people who seem to think time is not profitability spent unless it is devoted to some remunerative employment--that it is a waste of the precious hours to give any portion of them to play or even to relaxation. Work, work, work, is their idea of life, and to this idea, the health of multitudes has been sacrificed, and all that is worth living for entirely cast away.

docs.lead_paragraph: Sanitary science is of recent growth. It regards the health of localities and aims to obviate the sources of diseases. Its importance may be estimated from the fact that two-thirds, it has been calculated, of all prevalent diseases arise from causes theoretically removable, and practically so to a very large extent.

headline.main: BROOKLYN CITY.; BOARD OF SUPERVISORS. CITY COURT.
FRANCE.; Political, Personal, and Miscelaneous Gossip.

docs.lead_paragraph: The loan may be already pronounced a triumph. Indeed, I believe the Minister of Finance had received by telegraph and otherwise, six hours after the bureau were opened, data sufficient to assure its success. Such was the crowd at the single office in Paris, that the Moniteur of the next morning announced the establishment of fourtten others in the different wards.

docs.lead_paragraph: During the past week an extraordinary amount of sickness of the minor sort has prevailed, and a good many forms of chronic sickness have been exacerbated. It was a hard week for all persons suffering from diseases of the throat, lungs, and airpassages generally. The first part of it was un scasonally cold and raw.

docs.lead_paragraph: Professor QUINTARD, of the Memphis Medical College, road before the State Medical Society, In January, a paper on the health and mortality of that town, which, by order of the City Council, has been published. The population of Memphis is estimated at 15,000.

headline.main: FROM ST. THOMAS.; Restoration of Health--Personal Quarrels -- General Intelligence.

docs.lead_paragraph: Congratulate us upon the return of entire health to our Island. No more reports I trust, to issue hence, for many years to come, of the devastations of yellow fever or cholera. The fell disease gone, it is astonishing to see so little evidence of its late destructive power. ssed like
